thread.title: Bay City SVSU student headed to national theatre festival after regional award
thread.title_full: Bay City SVSU student headed to national theatre festival after regional award

author: Andy Hoag | ahoag@mlive.com
title: Bay City SVSU student headed to national theatre festival after regional award

organizations.name: kennedy center american college theatre festival

text: Jacob Kaufman earlier this month won the first-ever Region III Arts Management Fellowship, which earned him an invitation to the national Kennedy Center American College Theatre Festival in Washington in April.
